author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER EXPECTED TO BECOME A STRONG EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS...
summary: ...DEXTER EXPECTED TO BECOME A STRONG EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 5:00 AM AST Thu Aug 07 the center of Dexter was located near 40.6, -52.1 with movement ENE at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
